page.title: 18Shirley
page.content: Shirley is a mainly residential area, with a large council estate. There are several parks, the main one being St. James' Park, known commonly as the Wreck. There is a large rank of shops in Shirley High Street, including a few banks, various chain stores, many food shops and a few specialist shops, such as the tackle shop. There are also several public houses, and a police station. In the centre of this area is Bellmore Boys School. Along Winchester Rd. is a large cash & carry, two car retailers and a DIY centre.
